column4: hi all.....I'm an elementary school teacher and at work we have a SmartBoard...that works fine with our windows laptops. I have ubuntu on my laptop and I have downloaded the SmartBoard software.....however....I can't seem to get it to detect the board.....hooked up via laptop USB to Serial port on Smartboard. Has anyone here had experience getting ubuntu to work with a Smartboard (interactive whiteboard)...I'm running ubuntu 6.10
what kind of card do you have?
i have dual boot on a couple of machines what is your question?
if you have no luck with yr question here #edubuntu might be a place to try
